statements: SELECT id, organization_name, audit_date, compliance_status FROM media_regulatory_bodies;
SELECT organization_name, id, compliance_status, audit_date FROM media_regulatory_bodies WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT * FROM media_regulatory_bodies WHERE organization_name LIKE '%Media%';
SELECT organization_name, audit_date FROM media_regulatory_bodies ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT id, organization_name FROM media_regulatory_bodies WHERE compliance_status = false ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM media_regulatory_bodies WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT organization_name, audit_date FROM media_regulatory_bodies WHERE id = 5;
SELECT organization_name, compliance_status FROM media_regulatory_bodies WHERE audit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, organization_name, audit_date FROM media_regulatory_bodies ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT id, organization_name FROM media_regulatory_bodies WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM media_organizations;
SELECT name, location FROM media_organizations WHERE media_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT audit_date, compliance_status FROM audit_logs ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE compliance_status = True;
SELECT name, location FROM media_organizations ORDER BY name ASC, location DESC;
SELECT * FROM media_organizations WHERE name = 'Example Media' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT media_id, name FROM media_organizations WHERE location = 'New York' AND name LIKE '%News%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT media_id, name, location FROM media_organizations WHERE media_id IN (SELECT media_id FROM audit_logs WHERE compliance_status = TRUE) ORDER BY media_id;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE audit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT media_id FROM audit_logs WHERE compliance_status = FALSE ORDER BY media_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM media_organizations;
SELECT organization_name, location FROM media_organizations;
SELECT body_name, location FROM regulatory_bodies;
SELECT organization_id, body_id, audit_date FROM audits;
SELECT audit_id, organization_id, compliance_status FROM audits;
SELECT * FROM media_organizations WHERE organization_id = 1;
SELECT audit_id, organization_id, compliance_status FROM audits WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT organization_name, location FROM media_organizations WHERE location = 'USA';

SELECT audits.audit_id, media_organizations.organization_name, regulatory_bodies.body_name FROM audits INNER JOIN media_organizations ON audits.organization_id = media_organizations.organization_id INNER JOIN regulatory_bodies ON audits.body_id = regulatory_bodies.body_id WHERE audits.compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT organization_id, COUNT(audit_id) AS total_audits FROM audits GROUP BY organization_id HAVING COUNT(audit_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_bodies;
SELECT name, location FROM media_organizations WHERE regulatory_body_id = 1;
SELECT id, audit_date, compliance_status FROM audits ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM auditors WHERE role = 'Lead Auditor';
SELECT id, name, role FROM auditors WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM auditors WHERE role = 'Lead Auditor';
SELECT name, role FROM auditors ORDER BY name DESC;

SELECT audits.id, audits.audit_date, media_organizations.name AS media_organization, auditors.name AS auditor FROM audits JOIN media_organizations ON audits.media_organization_id = media_organizations.id JOIN auditors ON audits.auditor_id = auditors.id WHERE audits.compliance_status = true;

SELECT media_organizations.name AS media_organization, COUNT(audits.id) AS total_audits FROM media_organizations LEFT JOIN audits ON media_organizations.id = audits.media_organization_id GROUP BY media_organizations.name HAVING total_audits > 2;

SELECT media_organization, AVG(CAST(audit_date AS INT)) AS average_audit_year FROM audits JOIN media_organizations ON audits.media_organization_id = media_organizations.id GROUP BY media_organization ORDER BY average_audit_year ASC;
SELECT * FROM MediaOrganization;
SELECT org_name, registration_date FROM MediaOrganization WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT org_id, org_name, registration_date FROM MediaOrganization ORDER BY org_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceHistory WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT org_name, registration_date FROM MediaOrganization WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM MediaOrganization;
SELECT org_name, registration_date FROM MediaOrganization ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT org_name, compliance_status FROM MediaOrganization WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT org_name, audit_date, auditor_name, audit_result FROM MediaOrganization JOIN AuditTrail ON MediaOrganization.org_id = AuditTrail.org_id ORDER BY audit_date ASC;

SELECT org_name, finding_description, finding_status FROM MediaOrganization JOIN AuditTrail ON MediaOrganization.org_id = AuditTrail.org_id JOIN AuditFindings ON AuditTrail.audit_id = AuditFindings.audit_id WHERE finding_status = 'Open';
